title: "Vignette Title" author: "Vignette Author" date: "r Sys.Date()" output: rmarkdown::html_vignette vignette: > %\VignetteIndexEntry{Vignette Title} %\VignetteEngine{knitr::rmarkdown} %\VignetteEncoding{UTF-8}

This package uses the US National Highway Traffic Safety Administration's Fatality Analysis Reporting System, which is a nationwide census providing the American public yearly data regarding fatal injuries suffered in motor vehicle traffic crashes. The package contains several functions to read and summarize the data.

List of functions in the package:

fars_read() 
make_filename() 
fars_read_years() 
fars_summarize_years() 
fars_map_state()
